name: tool_capabilities
schema:
CREATE TABLE `tool_capabilities` (
	`tool_id` text NOT NULL,
	`capability_id` text NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY(`tool_id`, `capability_id`),
	FOREIGN KEY (`tool_id`) REFERENCES `tools`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE cascade,
	FOREIGN KEY (`capability_id`) REFERENCES `capabilities`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE cascade
)
